thread.title: Republicans Want Bigger Increase for Military Spending in Budget Talks

author: Kristina Peterson
title: Republicans Want Bigger Increase for Military Spending in Budget Talks
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”The brewing budget deal on Capitol Hill could get much larger thanks to a late Republican push for a bigger boost in defense spending.
As the spotlight has been on immigration negotiations, lawmakers and aides have been working behind the scenes to hammer out a two-year deal that would not only prevent the budget limits known as the sequester from kicking in, but potentially raise spending beyond that.
